Note: Participant experiencing frustration with swiping hand gestures
Participant describes photo and video quality as appearing to have a filter over them (hue and color undertones)
Participant noticed that tightening neural band helped register hand gestures but it felt uncomfortable
Participant loosened neural band to reduce physical discomfort but notices less registration of hand gestures
Participant attempting to zoom on camera and their inclination is to pinch fingers
Participant captures text through camera and is unsatisfied with legibility
Participant notes that images captured with MR glasses look like they were “taken with a microwave” which is a reference to poor camera quality
Participant hyperaware of dark vignette surrounding screen in MR glasses when capturing images
Participant feels that image quality is blurry and notices that closing left eye helps with image clarity
